summary: REQ-5 is partially implemented: the sign-in page now visibly displays the app name text "BRUTAL" as a prominent heading on LoginPage. However, the diff also changes other sign-in page content/styling (e.g., logo sizing, headline/tagline presentation, and button label), which conflicts with the requirement/constraints to avoid altering existing sign-in content beyond minimal spacing needed to insert the name.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not alter or re-layout any other existing sign-in page content beyond what is necessary to insert the app name; keep all existing sign-in sections present and functionally unchanged aside from minimal spacing.
missing_requirements.reason: LoginPage changes go beyond inserting the app name: the logo is enlarged, the title/headline/tagline styling/content formatting is modified, and the login button label is changed to "CONTINUE" (and related comments suggest additional alterations). This violates the "minimal change" constraint/AC even though the name was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Preloading the logo image and adding a skeleton/fallback icon while loading.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-5; requirement only asks to display app name text on sign-in page without other changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Changing sign-in page content/styling beyond adding the app name (e.g., enlarged logo, revised headline/tagline formatting, and changing the login button label to "CONTINUE").
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly outside scope/non-goals: no redesign or copy changes besides inserting the app name.

hallucinated_features.description: Updating repository meta/state documentation files (frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; only sign-in page should be updated.
